parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The username of the account. If you do not specify this parameter, all accounts of the instance are queried.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database in the instance. If you do not specify this parameter, all databases are queried. Valid values: 0 to 255. 0 specifies database 0.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

> We recommend that you specify a time range of 10 minutes or less because audit logs contain a great number of entries. Do not specify a time range that is longer than one day.

parameters.name: HostAddress
parameters.description: The IP address of the client. If you do not specify this parameter, this call applies to all clients.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the node in the instance. You can set this parameter to query the monitoring data of a specified node.

> 

*   This parameter is available only for read/write splitting and cluster instances.

*   You can call the [DescribeLogicInstanceTopology](~~473786~~) operation to query node IDs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: QueryKeywords
parameters.description:
The keyword based on which the audit logs are queried. You can specify a command as a keyword to query logs. By default, all commands are queried.

> You can specify only a single keyword in each call.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
